src:
成功企业家张金发伉俪 令郎蔚辰君与张凤珊小姐结婚礼隆重举行

04 Nov 2019, 03:18




新郎新娘与双方家长及其家属向来宾们敬酒。



左起：余有信伉俪、洪长荣、张金发伉俪、俞雨龄夫人、新郎新娘、俞雨龄、张目真伉俪、杨金锋、李振亮、洪明辉、杨捷源合影。



左起：吴国富、林松石、谢华安、王振坤伉俪、张金发伉俪、杨克林、新郎新娘、来宾、陈志明伉俪、张目真伉俪、林秀礼伉俪合影。



左起：陈新伉俪、林敏亮伉俪、廖扬宗伉俪、张金发伉俪、新郎新娘、来宾、张目真伉俪、蔡裕资伉俪、江淼成、锺延筹、张和然、林福海合影。


【本报周孙毅报道】11月2日晚，我国成功企业家PT.Dwinaga Sakti Abadi、PT.Inti Prima Indonesia (Homyped)总裁、雅加达龙岩同乡会永久荣誉会长张金发先生和夫人何玲玲女士令满郎蔚辰君，与张目真先生和夫人赖美璇女士令长媛凤珊小姐之结婚典礼，在雅加达Mulia国际大酒店礼堂举行。     婚礼隆重，贺客盈门，来自国内外亲朋戚友，各国使节代表，华社领导，工商企业界人士，同乡梓叔等，逾千人出席酒会。     与会来宾除了向男女双方主婚人表达诚挚的祝福外，也祝愿这对新郎新娘恩爱美满、白头偕老、早生贵子。
text:
Successful entrepreneur Zhang Jinxuan Ling Lang Weichen and Miss Zhang Fengshan held a wedding ceremony

04 Nov 2019, 03:18




The bride and groom and the parents of both parties and their families toast to the guests.



From left: Yu Youxin, Hong Changrong, Zhang Jinxuan, Mrs. Yu Yuling, the bride and groom, Yu Yuling, Zhang Muzhen, Yang Jinfeng, Li Zhenliang, Hong Minghui, Yang Jieyuan.



From left: Wu Guofu, Lin Songshi, Xie Huaan, Wang Zhenkun, Zhang Jinxuan, Yang Kelin, bride and groom, guests, Chen Zhiming, Zhang Muzhen, Lin Xiuli.



From left: Chen Xinyi, Lin Minliang, Liao Yangzong, Zhang Jinxuan, bride and groom, guests, Zhang Muzhen, Cai Yuzi, Jiang Yucheng, Yan Yanqi, Zhang Heran, Lin Fuhai.


[Report by Zhou Sunyi] On the evening of November 2nd, the successful entrepreneurs of China, PT.Dwinaga Sakti Abadi, the president of PT.Inti Prima Indonesia (Homyped), the permanent honorary president of the Longyan Association of Jakarta, and the wife of Ms. He Lingling Lang Weichen, the wedding ceremony with Ms. Zhang Muzhen and his wife, Ms. Lai Meizhen, and Ms. Longyuan Fengshan, was held in the auditorium of Mulia International Hotel in Jakarta. The wedding was grand, the guest was Yingmen, from home and abroad friends, friends from various countries, leaders of the Chinese community, business and industry leaders, uncles and uncles, and more than a thousand people attended the reception. In addition to expressing sincere wishes to the married couples of both men and women, the guests also wished the bride and groom a happy, white-headed, early-born child.
